title: Mojang服务器部分问题已经修复
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2014-4-8 23:15 编辑 



@MojangSupport:
Looks like the launcher is working now! The websites are still down, but it should not be long now. Thanks for your patience!
看起来启动器已经正常运作了！网站还在修复，但应该不会很久，很快就能好了。感谢你们的耐心！
